content:
january 3 2008 calendar page this pattern is based on a pattern by katherine lee of  sweaterbabe com   the inspiration pattern can be found in pdf format here   katherine s pattern was knit flat and contained four cables -- this pattern is knit in the round and contains five or ten cables

additional pattern information

debbie bliss cashmerino aran is used for the newborn size   size us 8 5 0 mm needles are used when knitting this size

debbie bliss cashmerino baby is used for the preemie size with a gauge of 24 stitches per 4 inches   size us 3 3 25 mm needles are used when knitting this size
